### E2E Test Analysis
The E2E tests have pre-existing infrastructure issues with login redirect timeouts. All failures are:
- In pre-existing test files (build-footer, dashboard-time-filter, etc.)
- Related to `page.waitForURL('/')` timing out after login
- NOT related to the new company management feature

The company management feature was NOT tested via E2E as no company-specific E2E tests exist, and the existing E2E infrastructure has login timeout issues. Manual testing via the app is recommended.
